data.title: Hartlepool United Football Club

To continually modernise and improve the thinking, behaviours and practices across all activities of the Club whilst reconnecting supporters and the wider community with the Clubâ€™s core football values and unique heritage.
data.text: Take your matchday experience to another level at Victoria Park with our packages for younger supporters ðŸ™Œ Bookings are now open for pre-season by emailing commercial@hartlepoolunited.co.uk. Mascot Package - Â£240 inc VAT For those who are wanting to take their matchday experience to another level and make memories to last a lifetime. From meeting the team before kick-off to walking out on the pitch at Victoria Park. â€¢ A Hartlepool United home strip (shirt, shorts & socks) â€¢ Two tickets to the game seated in the hospitality area of The Cyril Knowles Stand (1x adult & 1x mascot ticket) â€¢ Warm-up with Hâ€™Angus on the pitch pre-match â€¢ Meet HUFC players prior to fixture â€¢ Run out onto the pitch with the team â€¢ Acknowledgement in the matchday programme â€¢ Digital matchday programme & teamsheet â€¢ A personalised photo album complete with photographs taken on the day Junior Poolies - Â£300 inc VAT For a matchday experience like no other, our Junior Poolies package ensures a number of younger supporters will enjoy a day they wonâ€™t forget. Perfect for parties, local teams, and more. â€¢ Fourteen junior tickets (additional tickets are available) â€¢ Two adult tickets â€¢ Use of the Centenary Lounge â€“ three reserved tables â€¢ Visit to the changing rooms to meet the players and have a group photo taken by one of our photographers â€¢ Food and drinks provided (sandwiches, cakes, crisps, fruit shoots) â€¢ Pre-match flag bearing â€¢ Penalties on the pitch at half-time
